page.title: 02FARMING-1
page.content:
Farming over the last 50 years has condensed into much larger units.The smallest farm in the survey is now 125 acres which 50 years ago was a medium size farm.However there is still one farm worker who has about 6 cattle in odd corners of fields who is a remnant of{verge farming}of the last century.
There are some small pieces of land in the villages used for horses and ponies,but all the small holdings have now been absorbed into the larger farms.These smaller farms nearly all produced milk but milk is now produced on only two farms albeit on a large scale (over 100 cows each).
Oilseed rape is grown on four farms and peas on one.
